<title level="1" right="Trait">[Steam](/Traits.aspx?ID=415)</title>

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 236 <sup>2.0</sup>

Items with this trait are powered by engines that boil water to produce steam and move their components.
name: Steam
